tool_description: This API will provide the details of all the Chemists, Pharmacy and Drugstores of India
name: Chemists Pharmacy and Drugstores of India
title: Chemists Pharmacy and Drugstores of India
tool_name: Chemists Pharmacy and Drugstores of India

api_list.name: Drugstore home
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chemists-pharmacy-and-drugstores-of-india.p.rapidapi.com/chemist/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chemists-pharmacy-and-drugstores-of-india.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
